metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39534 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: eprosima Fast DDS is a C++ implementation of the Data Distribution Service standard of the Object Management Group. Prior to versions 2.10.0, 2.9.2, and 2.6.5, a malformed GAP submessage can trigger assertion failure, crashing FastDDS. Version 2.10.0, 2.9.2, and 2.6.5 contain a patch for this issue.

criterions.comment: fastdds package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
